name: Sonic Stardust Crusader Duck
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Sonic World Super Sonic Racing". If this card is Ritual Summoned using a "Sonic Duck": You can banish 1 card from your opponentâ€™s hand. You can target 1 card on the field; Return both it and this card to the hand and if you do, add 1 "Sonic World Super Sonic Racing" from your GY or that is banished to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Sonic Stardust Crusader Duck" once per turn.
